title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
### BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs - Black

**Model Number:** 2554A  
**Brand:** BISSELL  
**Color:** Black

#### Product Highlights

- **All-In-One Solution:** The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is designed to meet all your cleaning needs with its powerful vacuum and mop functionalities.
- **Supports a Great Cause:** Your purchase supports the BISSELL Pet Foundation, contributing to their mission to help pets in need.
- **Rotating Brush System:** Enjoy improved edge cleaning and versatile cleaning with the rotating brush system.
- **Cordless Convenience:** With a 36V Lithium-Ion battery, you can enjoy up to 30 minutes of continuous cordless cleaning.
- **Multi-Surface Cleaning:** The CrossWave Max is compatible with a wide range of surfaces, including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs.
- **Improved Edge Cleaning:** Experience better cleaning around edges and corners with the improved edge cleaning feature.
- **WiFi Connectivity:** Connect to the BISSELL Connect app for remote control and monitoring of your cleaning tasks.
- **Self-Cleaning Cycle:** Keep your vacuum cleaner in top condition with the self-cleaning cycle.
- **Two-Tank Technology:** The two-tank system (clean water tank and dirt tank) allows for easy cleaning and maintenance.
- **Included Accessories:** The kit comes with 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls.

#### Key Specifications

- **Cleaning Path Width:** 10.5 inches
- **Swivel Head:** True
- **Carry Handle:** True
- **Battery Type:** 36V Lithium-Ion
- **Tank Capacities:**
  - Clean Water Tank: 28 oz
  - Dirt Tank: 18.6 oz
- **Compatible Surfaces:** Tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, area rugs
- **Included Accessories:** 
  - 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas
  - 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas
  - 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls

### Get Ready to Clean and Mop with Convenience and Efficiency!

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop is the perfect tool for your home cleaning needs. Its advanced features and support for a great cause make it a smart investment for any family.
